products.title: Fastrack New Limitless FS1 Smart Watch|Biggest 1.95" Horizon Curve...

reviews.review_text: I purchased it for Rs 2K. Given the price, I do not recommend or advise otherwise. I have listed below my experience with this watch. This will help buyers making informed buying choice.Pros:1. Big enough and looks good.2. Companion App with  your rank in your city and globally.3. Ability to send data to standard goole health app.4. Enough sports mode with parameters like aerobic training effect and required cooling time, step length etc. It gives you more insight about exercise.5. Custom watch face. Though it gives basic information only. Choosing display values would have been better.6. Mostly accurate steps, heart beat rate and SpO2. However, I find it gives lesser steps and distance covered if you walk fast. The gap is about 10%.7. Senses activity and prompts you to start tracking.8.Alexa for weather update etc.9. Music and camera control from watch.10. Enough bright under  sun at 100% nits.11. I assume data, micro code and app code control lies with fastrack(Tata). Better than giving data in control of Chinese companies.12. Silicon strap is good.13. Control of apps that can send messages to watch and display is good enough.14. The microphone and speaker are very good. You can really make good calls with this watch.15. Battery runs for 2-3 days with all tracking on and 60% brightness.Cons:1. The biggest issue is that automatic functions like spo2, sleep, stress etc. stop abruptly. Several times it did not record sleep, her, stress at all. I feel if you restart the watch everyday, it still works better.2. Sleep tracker gives basic values and looks like it  works for a specific period only. If you wake once even for nature's call, it stops tracking sleep. Overall, it's useless.3. Alexa disconnects automatically and needs to be setup again. Not sure if this is alexa app or something else but the user experience for this function is not that pleasant due to this issue4. The knob doesn't have scroll function. It rotates for nothing.5. Requires tight fitting to track values making it inconvenient to wear it for longer periods.6. Tucking the strap inside is inconvenient. Some other brands also have the same but it is not good for men with hairs on hand and watch requiring tight fit to track values. A conventional loop would be better.7. If you accidently replace a watch face with your custom face, it is impossible to bring it back. I am unable not find a way so far.8. No amoled screen. I personally do not think it is required for watch.In summary, if you do not rely on automatic functions and can provide manual inputs, not keen on tracking sleep and live with cons, it is worth a buy at this price tag else not.

Watch in better in this range.1. All tracking function working correctly.2. You can see notification of apps.3. Battery backup is about 7 day in 20% brightness.4. IP68 is great in this watch, you can enjoy swimming with wearing this.Cons.1. it should be given inbuilt games.2. Full contact should be shown on phone directory.3. Other apps like WhatsApp, massage, should be install to read and reply.4. Hindi fort reading option should be given.

Watch shows perfect time. there was issue in watch app, but solved by fastrack by giving update. The Fastrack New Limitless FS1 smartwatch offers an impressive combination of style and functionality. With its sleek design and customizable watch faces, it caters to a variety of tastes. The watch boasts a range of fitness tracking features, including heart rate monitoring, step counting, and sleep tracking, which can provide valuable insights into your health and well-being.The FS1's battery life is commendable, allowing you to use it throughout the day without frequent charging. Its compatibility with both Android and iOS devices ensures that most users can take advantage of its features without any compatibility issues. The inclusion of notifications for calls, messages, and social media updates helps you stay connected without needing to constantly check your phone.However, as with any smartwatch, there might be some room for improvement. Users might find the touch screen responsiveness a bit lacking at times, and the app ecosystem might not be as extensive as some other competitors. Additionally, the watch's accuracy in terms of health metrics can sometimes be a bit off compared to dedicated medical devices.In conclusion, the Fastrack New Limitless FS1 smartwatch offers a well-rounded package for those looking for a stylish and functional wearable. It's particularly suitable for individuals who want to keep track of their fitness goals and stay connected on the go. Just keep in mind its minor drawbacks and make sure they align with your needs and expectations.

It is the biggest problem in it. But overall smartwatch is good. If you are planning to buy this one, definitely go with it.!!!

The Smartwatch offers standout features like a spacious screen, seamless Bluetooth calling, and reliable SPO2 health monitoring, as per 3day use.However, it falters with non-functional sleep tracking, inconsistent Alexa performance, and limited notification display, often requiring phone access to read full messages. Furthermore, the absence of a dual time zone watch face is a notable drawback for users needing multiple time references.

If you're in the market for a new smartwatch, then look no further than the Fastrack New Limitless FS1 Smart Watch.  I've had the chance to test out this product for a while now, and I have to say, I'm thoroughly impressed.First of all, let's talk about the display. The biggest 1.95" Horizon Curve Display is simply stunning. It's crystal clear and easy to read, even in bright sunlight. And the fact that it's a curved display means that you get an even better viewing experience.The watch also features SingleSync BT Calling v5.3, which means that you can take calls and talk to people directly from your wrist. It's incredibly convenient, and I love not having to take my phone out of my pocket every time I receive a call.Another fantastic feature is the built-in Alexa. With Alexa, you can ask for the weather, set reminders, and even control your smart home devices, all with just your voice. It's a great addition that makes the Fastrack New Limitless FS1 Smart Watch even more useful.And let's not forget about the battery life. With a mega 7-day battery, you won't have to worry about constantly charging your watch. This is especially important if you're someone who's always on the go and doesn't have time to charge their devices constantly.The ATS Chipset with Zero Lag is also a standout feature. The watch runs smoothly and quickly, and I've never experienced any lag or delays.With over 100 sports modes and 150+ watchfaces, the Fastrack New Limitless FS1 Smart Watch has something for everyone. Whether you're a runner, swimmer, or weightlifter, you'll find a sports mode that suits your needs. And with so many watchfaces to choose from, you can customize your watch to your heart's content.Overall, I highly recommend the Fastrack New Limitless FS1 Smart Watch. It's packed with features, has an impressive battery life, and looks great on your wrist. If you're in the market for a new smartwatch, this one should definitely be at the top of your list.

products.title: Fire-Boltt Invincible Plus 1.43" AMOLED Display Smartwatch with...

reviews.review_text: I recently purchased the Fire Boltt Invincible Plus Smart Watch, and I must say I'm quite impressed with what this budget-friendly smartwatch offers. Here's my detailed review:**Design and Build Quality (4/5):**The Fire Boltt Invincible Plus comes with a sleek and stylish design. It feels comfortable on the wrist, thanks to the adjustable silicone strap. The watch has a sturdy build, and it's surprisingly lightweight, making it perfect for daily wear.**Display (4/5):**The 1.7-inch HD touchscreen display is vibrant and easy to read, even in bright sunlight. The touch responsiveness is good, allowing you to navigate through menus and notifications effortlessly.**Features (4/5):**For its price point, the Fire Boltt Invincible Plus offers an impressive set of features. It covers all the basics you'd expect from a smartwatch, including heart rate monitoring, sleep tracking, step counting, and more. It even has IPX7 water resistance, so you don't have to worry about wearing it during workouts or in the rain.**Health Tracking (4/5):**The heart rate monitoring and sleep tracking features provide valuable insights into your health. The watch syncs with the companion app, allowing you to track your progress over time. It also has multiple sports modes for those who enjoy working out.**Battery Life (3.5/5):**The battery life is decent, lasting around 2-3 days on a single charge with moderate use. While not the best in its category, it's sufficient for most users.**Connectivity and Notifications (4/5):**The smartwatch pairs easily with your smartphone via Bluetooth. It delivers notifications for calls, messages, and app alerts, keeping you connected without needing to check your phone constantly.**Companion App (3.5/5):**The Fire Boltt app is user-friendly and provides a clear overview of your health and fitness data. However, there's room for improvement in terms of additional features and customization.**Value for Money (4.5/5):**One of the standout aspects of the Fire Boltt Invincible Plus is its affordability. It offers a solid set of features and performance that you'd expect from a more expensive smartwatch.**Conclusion:**The Fire Boltt Invincible Plus Smart Watch is a fantastic value for the price. While it may not have all the bells and whistles of premium smartwatches, it covers the essentials well and looks great on your wrist. If you're on a budget and looking for a reliable and stylish smartwatch, the Fire Boltt Invincible Plus is a solid choice.Overall Rating: 4/5I hope this review helps you in making an informed decision about your Fire Boltt Invincible Plus Smart Watch purchase!

Reviewing after 10 days of usagePositive:- a budget smartwatch with heavy build quality, rich specifications- decent battery life. With Bluetooth mostly off, I got 4 days of battery time (58% to 17%). Charged to 93%, all day Bluetooth and calls, every 5 minutes health monitoring on, battery lasted for almost 3.75 days (93% to 17%).- Many features, but rarely you are going to use much.- a handy calculator is a plus. But I found some difficulty in calculating more numbers. Like, 12345+2345+345.....- smooth functioning- local songs on tws is easy and better- mic and speaker are better- 4gb memory is really fantasticNegatives -These are not actually negative points. But there is a room for improvement in these issues.- You will never be able to listen to local songs on tws, in addition to getting calls. Example, SW is connected with your headphone. You play songs on headphone. At this time your SW will not be connected to Phone. So you can't get calls on SW.Same way, if you are connected with phone Bluetooth, you can't listen to local songs on headphone.- your steps get counted while driving. Even if you go to sports mode and select driving now. It will count steps. That adds it to total day steps and your calculations goes wrong.- there is no option to turn off call ringer, except puting it on DND.- While on local mode, it should just show calls, I found that it is automatically picking calls within a sec of call received. (I will need to check this again)- 500 sports mode is useless thing. One should be able to select the required modes on app. Only those will be shown on the SW. Otherwise you need 5 minutes to find the correct mode for you.- add stress measurement sensor- not showing main screen when you have a password protection on. Just shows time.- double tap to on screen is a much required feature for SW.- improvement in app required

I recently purchased the Fire Boltt Invincible Plus Smart Watch, and I must say I'm quite impressed with what this budget-friendly smartwatch offers. Here's my detailed review:**Design and Build Quality (4/5):**The Fire Boltt Invincible Plus comes with a sleek and stylish design. It feels comfortable on the wrist, thanks to the adjustable silicone strap. The watch has a sturdy build, and it's surprisingly lightweight, making it perfect for daily wear.**Display (4/5):**The 1.7-inch HD touchscreen display is vibrant and easy to read, even in bright sunlight. The touch responsiveness is good, allowing you to navigate through menus and notifications effortlessly.**Features (4/5):**For its price point, the Fire Boltt Invincible Plus offers an impressive set of features. It covers all the basics you'd expect from a smartwatch, including heart rate monitoring, sleep tracking, step counting, and more. It even has IPX7 water resistance, so you don't have to worry about wearing it during workouts or in the rain.**Health Tracking (4/5):**The heart rate monitoring and sleep tracking features provide valuable insights into your health. The watch syncs with the companion app, allowing you to track your progress over time. It also has multiple sports modes for those who enjoy working out.**Battery Life (3.5/5):**The battery life is decent, lasting around 2-3 days on a single charge with moderate use. While not the best in its category, it's sufficient for most users.**Connectivity and Notifications (4/5):**The smartwatch pairs easily with your smartphone via Bluetooth. It delivers notifications for calls, messages, and app alerts, keeping you connected without needing to check your phone constantly.**Companion App (3.5/5):**The Fire Boltt app is user-friendly and provides a clear overview of your health and fitness data. However, there's room for improvement in terms of additional features and customization.**Value for Money (4.5/5):**One of the standout aspects of the Fire Boltt Invincible Plus is its affordability. It offers a solid set of features and performance that you'd expect from a more expensive smartwatch.**Conclusion:**The Fire Boltt Invincible Plus Smart Watch is a fantastic value for the price. While it may not have all the bells and whistles of premium smartwatches, it covers the essentials well and looks great on your wrist. If you're on a budget and looking for a reliable and stylish smartwatch, the Fire Boltt Invincible Plus is a solid choice.Overall Rating: 4/5I hope this review helps you in making an informed decision about your Fire Boltt Invincible Plus Smart Watch purchase!

Please keep this in mind, watch is too good but mobile application is too bad. Nobody addressed the review comments in Google Play Store. Now I am bit worried about the after sales services because all the Play Store users put negative reviews and application rating is below 3 starts, even though there is no response from company's side. App doesn't have Google fit connect or any thing like that, I don't know what the use of that app. It's only useful for Bluetooth calling and call notification. If you're okay with mobile application please go ahead and purchase this watch, because watch is good.

I am totally amazed by the features, battery life of this smart watch.A seamless Blue Tooth calling feature which makes picking calls so accessible from the watch.It has Al voice assistant which listens to my every command !The AMOLED display is very clear & it gives decent brightness in the sun.The watch is comfortable to wear all day (and night) and looks very stylish. Setup is easy. The downloadable da fit app allows for easy configuration of the smart watch.The fitness features work very well and accurately - pedometer, heart rate, calories etc. The sleep tracker also records your deep/light sleep patterns. All features work as advertised. Sports settings work well - I have used it for running and cycling with accurate recording.This is a genuine investment and one should definitely go ahead purchasing this smart watch.

I appreciate the ability to customize watch faces and app notifications to suit my style and preferences. It's a big dial, but it adds a personal touch to the deviceAnd Considering the quality and features, I believe this smartwatch offers excellent value for money. It competes admirably with higher-priced alternatives on the market.Thank you fire bolt‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

A good and stylish smart watchPros:1. Luxury feel in a good price range: This watch has cool metallic body with functional crown and two function buttons with red lining, this gives a premium feel on hands.2. Almost accurate health monitoring: The heart rate, sleep, and spo2 monitoring is 90-95% accurate and provides enough info for an on the go check3. Display: The display is bright enough and has a punch to its color, the amoled display is surely good at this price4. Features like calculator, recorder, always on display, lock, games and songs are a good addition to this watch5. The storage in this watch is more than enough to store songs and recordings  and has a  good and loud speaker with easy controlsCons:1. The small display and bezels are a let down: The display quality is surely good but the display size is small, the additional bezels are a bit let down2. The straps: The metallic straps are good but the silicon straps are low quality3. The watch faces: Although the amount of watch faces are good and it supports live watch faces but the live watch faces hang in between and are glitchy and the refresh rate is low and the pre installed watch faces are not that good and u can't even change them.Overall the watch is good and is surely a must buy if u are looking for a good budget watch that gives premium feel‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê

The Fire Boltt smartwatch is a true marvel of modern technology. Its sleek design seamlessly blends fashion and functionality, making it a wonderful accessory for anyone. The vibrant, high-resolution display is a visual delight, providing crystal-clear access to a wealth of information at your wrist.But it's not just about looks; the Fire Boltt smartwatch is a powerhouse of features. From tracking your health and fitness goals with precision to keeping you connected with notifications from your smartphone, it's a versatile companion for the modern lifestyle.What truly sets the Fire Boltt apart is its attention to detail. Its robust battery life ensures that you won't be constantly searching for a charger, and the user-friendly interface makes navigation a breeze. With its water-resistant build, you can take it anywhere, from the gym to the great outdoors, without worry.In a world of smartwatches, the Fire Boltt stands out as a testament to innovation and elegance. It's not just a timepiece; it's a statement of sophistication and convenience that enhances your daily life. Whether you're a tech enthusiast or simply seeking a stylish way to stay connected, the Fire Boltt smartwatch is a wonderful choice that ticks all the right boxes.

I recently purchased the Firebolt watch and I must say, I am thoroughly impressed with its performance and features. This watch is a true game-changer in the world of smartwatches.Firstly, the design of the Firebolt watch is sleek and stylish. It has a modern and minimalist look that can easily complement any outfit, whether it's a casual day out or a formal event. The build quality is exceptional, with a durable stainless steel case and a scratch-resistant sapphire crystal display, ensuring that it can withstand everyday wear and tear.One of the standout features of the Firebolt watch is its vibrant and sharp AMOLED display. The colors are incredibly vivid, making it a pleasure to view notifications, messages, and other information on the screen. The touch responsiveness is also top-notch, making navigation through menus and apps a breeze.In terms of functionality, the Firebolt watch truly excels. It seamlessly connects to my smartphone via Bluetooth, allowing me to receive notifications for calls, messages, emails, and social media updates directly on my wrist. The watch also has a built-in microphone and speaker, enabling me to make and receive calls without needing to take out my phone.The fitness tracking capabilities of the Firebolt watch are also worth mentioning. It accurately tracks my steps, distance, calories burned, and heart rate throughout the day. The watch also offers various workout modes, including running, cycling, and swimming, providing real-time data to help me monitor my progress and achieve my fitness goals.Battery life is another area where the Firebolt watch shines. With regular use, I can easily go two to three days without needing to recharge. This is impressive considering the vibrant display and the multitude of features packed into this watch.Overall, I am extremely satisfied with my purchase of the Firebolt watch. It offers a perfect balance between style and functionality, making it an excellent choice for anyone in need of a high-quality smartwatch. Whether you're a fitness enthusiast, a busy professional, or simply someone who appreciates a well-designed timepiece, the Firebolt watch is definitely worth considering.

This is a good smartwatch in this range and is value for money. Main attractions for me would be the music player which can connect with phone or earbuds and can also play locally stored songs on the built-in speaker or earbuds. It also has feature for receiving calls and also making calls. It can also receive notifications from apps like Whatsapp on your mobile.It also has other good features like body parameters measurement like heart rate etc. It also has some small games which you can play when bored. It also has modes for various activities you can explore.
